newsitem.title: USA: Bids for US surplus nickel range $3.1313-$3.166/lb.
newsitem.headline: Bids for US surplus nickel range $3.1313-$3.166/lb.

text.p: The U.S. Defense National Stockpile Center said Thursday that it received bids from three companies to buy surplus nickel at a price ranging from $3.1313 to $3.166 per lb.
High bidder was BenMet NY which offered to buy 80 lbs of nickel for $3.166 per lb, another 80 lbs at $3.156 per lb and a final 80 lbs at $3.146 per lb.
Low bidder was Abbey Metal Corp which offered to buy 40 lbs of nickel at $3.1313 per lb.
